sys_script.name: location autofetch in create profile

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_99b176c2932a421094e3f15a7bba10ba
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1383184_charityb_user_profile</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>location autofetch in create profile</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /* previous is not used in this example */) {
    // Get the current logged-in user
    var user = gs.getUser();
    
    // Get the user's location (assuming location data is stored in a field on the user record)
    var location = user.getLocation();
    
    // Update the user profile table with the location data
    var profileGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_user_profile');
    if (profileGR.get('name', user.getID())) {
        profileGR.setValue('location', location);
        profileGR.update();
    } else {
        // If the user profile record doesn't exist, create a new one
        profileGR.initialize();
        profileGR.setValue('user_field_name', user.getID());
        profileGR.setValue('location_field_name', location);
        profileGR.insert();
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>christy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-04 05:11:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>99b176c2932a421094e3f15a7bba10ba</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>location autofetch in create profile</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_99b176c2932a421094e3f15a7bba10ba</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>christy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-11 10:12:05</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=99b176c2932a421094e3f15a7bba10ba"/></record_update>
